albums.description: Leessang (Korean: 리쌍) was a South Korean hip hop duo, composed of Kang Hee-gun (Gary or Garie) and Gil Seong-joon (Gil)
Jay Chou(周杰伦; born January 18, 1979) is a Taiwanese singer, songwriter, record producer, rapper, actor, and television personality.

Michael Joseph Jackson (August 29, 1958 – June 25, 2009) was an American singer, songwriter, dancer, and philanthropist. He is regarded as one of the most significant cultural figures of the 20th century.
Stefanie Sun (孙燕姿) is a Singaporean singer-songwriter. In 2000, she released her debut album, Yan Zi, which won her a Golden Melody Award for Best New Artist.
Wayne Lin Junjie (林俊傑, born 27 March 1981), better known by his stage name JJ Lin, is a Singaporean singer, songwriter, record producer and actor.
Jay Chou(周杰伦; born January 18, 1979) is a Taiwanese singer, songwriter, record producer, rapper, actor, and television personality.
(G)I-dle (Korean: (여자)아이들), stylized in all caps, is a South Korean girl group formed by Cube Entertainment in 2018.
Blackpink (Korean: 블랙핑크) is a South Korean girl group formed by YG Entertainment, consisting of members Jisoo, Jennie, Rosé, and Lisa.
Leessang (Korean: 리쌍) was a South Korean hip hop duo, composed of Kang Hee-gun (Gary or Garie) and Gil Seong-joon (Gil)
